statements: SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, preferences FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE financial_behavior = 'Good'
SELECT customer_name, preferences FROM customers WHERE financial_behavior = 'Good' ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE financial_behavior IN ('Good', 'Average')
SELECT customer_name, financial_behavior FROM customers WHERE preferences IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(preferences) > 10 ORDER BY financial_behavior ASC
SELECT customer_name, financial_behavior FROM customers WHERE financial_behavior = 'Good' OR financial_behavior = 'Excellent' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 5, 9)
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, financial_behavior FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, financial_preferences FROM customers WHERE financial_behavior = 'loyal';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, targeted_customer_group FROM campaigns ORDER BY campaign_end_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, financial_behavior FROM customers WHERE financial_behavior = 'loyal';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_end_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, financial_preferences FROM customers WHERE financial_behavior = 'risky' AND customer_id > 3;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, financial_preferences, financial_behavior FROM customers WHERE financial_behavior = 'neutral' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email, financial_behavior FROM customers WHERE financial_behavior = 'Good';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE financial_behavior = 'Good';
SELECT customer_id, transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, preference_category FROM customers INNER JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE customers.financial_behavior = 'Fair';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, preference_category, preference_details FROM preferences WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500);

SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE financial_behavior = 'loyal';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM targeted_campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE financial_behavior = 'High Risk';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM targeted_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, income FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, count(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference FROM preferences WHERE preference = 'music';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT name, segment, age FROM customers WHERE segment = 'VIP' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT products.name, products.price, category FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT customers.name, products.name, purchases.quantity FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT preference FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 1001;
